pongproject
Class PaddleMovement

java.lang.Object
  pongproject.PaddleMovement

public class PaddleMovement
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the methods that calculate where the paddles will move.

Mark

Method Detail

movePaddles

public int[] movePaddles(int ballY,
                         int ballD,
                         int pad1Y,
                         int pad1H,
                         int pad2Y,
                         int pad2H)
Moves the appropriate paddle if and only if the key bound to the direction is pressed.

Parameters:
ballY - - ball's Y coordinate
ballD - - ball's diameter
pad1Y - - paddle one's Y coordinate
pad1H - - paddle one's height
pad2Y - - paddle two's Y coordinate
pad2H - - paddle two's height
Returns:
- the coordinates for the paddle

pad2H - - paddle two's height
